Class Database

        public static void joinDatabasesx(Database a,
                                  Database b)
        "Merge" Database b into Database a. If both databases have issues with the same name, Database b will give the ID to Database a. This method uses Threads
        Parameters:

      • joinDatabases

        public static void joinDatabases(Database a,
                                 Database b)
        "Merge" Database b into Database a. If both databases have issues with the same name, Database b will give the ID to Database a.
        Parameters:
        a - : Database
        b - : Database
